block.p: EDELSTEIN-Hon. David N. The judges of the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York express deep regret at the death of our esteemed colleague and friend. We extend our profound sympathy to Judge Edelstein's family. Michael B. Mukasey, Chief Judge
EDELSTEIN-Judge David N. With deep sorrow, Round Dune Coop of East Quogue records the death of our longtime owner and good friend. Sincere condolences to Florence and members of the family.
